department_name: Calaveras County Environmental Management Agency (EMA) - Environmental Health Division

inspection_details.reinspection_trigger: Re-inspection fees are charged for violations requiring follow-up, temporary food facilities subject to re-inspection and/or closure if requirements not met at initial inspection

facility_safety_authority.department_name: CAL FIRE (California Department of Forestry and Fire Protection) Tuolumne-Calaveras Unit and local fire departments
facility_safety_authority.ansul_system_requirements: Commercial kitchen fire suppression systems required per NFPA 96, inspected every 6 months by licensed fire protection companies per industry standards

regulatory_framework.food_code_basis: California Retail Food Code (CalCode) - referenced in temporary food facility applications

confidence_notes: Official Calaveras County EMA website pages have minimal content loading, preventing access to detailed food facility inspection procedures, grading systems, and specific requirements. Contact information verified (209) 754-6399, address at 891 Mountain Ranch Road, San Andreas, CA 95249. Fire safety requirements based on standard California NFPA requirements rather than county-specific documentation.
verification_notes: Direct contact with Calaveras County Environmental Health Department at (209) 754-6399 required to verify: 1) Specific grading/scoring system used for food facility inspections, 2) Inspection frequency and risk-based scheduling, 3) Public disclosure requirements, 4) Local ordinances beyond CalCode, 5) Specific fire department(s) conducting commercial kitchen inspections, 6) Complete permit requirements and fees.
